channel.title: KettleBell and Run Blog
channel.description: Recent content on KettleBell and Run Blog

item.title: I Signed Up
item.description: I signed up for the 10k Walnut Creek Run!!

item.title: Foam Roller Magic
item.description: I bought a foam roller a while back and barely used it up until this week when my right knee started giving me grief.

item.title: Next Steps
item.description: November has come to an end and I have to make some decisions on what I’ll do next, but first a retrospective.

item.title: Week4 Run One
item.description: I managed to squeeze in a run today despite a few setbacks the last couple of days.

item.title: A new twist to my workouts
item.description: Stumbled upon a few Primal/Animal movements and decided to incorporate them as part of my active rest day as well as my strength and cardio workouts.

item.title: I Bought a Fitness Watch
item.description: I decided to buy myself (company paid for it as part of the wellness perk) a fitness watch

item.title: Misty Morning Run
item.description: It was a cold and misty 5k run on Saturday.

item.title: A Few Kettlebell Complexes
item.description: My workout today was a bit of a mix of everything which basically means I did a bunch of complexes.

item.title: My First 10k Run
item.description: I did it, I ran my first 10k, actually it was 10.85km and it felt awesome!!

item.title: Long Cycle Workout
item.description: As I prepare for longer runs I’ve decided to incorporate long cycle workouts to build my aerobic capacity and endurance.

item.title: November Week3 Run2
item.description: Today is a run day, my plan is to try and hit 6 miles as I prepare for my first 10k race.

item.title: My November Challenge
item.description: In the beginning of November I have challenged myself to run 3 times a week for the next four weeks.

item.title: About Me
item.description:
• Born in 1981
  • Father of 3 girls
  • Based in the Bay Area but originally from Kenya
